title: My Mom Favors My Sister
description:
Pam's mother is helping her sister raise her daughter and Pam feels envious of the amount of time they get to spend together. - Dr. Laura: "Be thankful that your personalities and situations are so different."

Which of your siblings gets the most attention? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
